heading: Catwalk
description: In a team of 4, we've created a product-landing page with components that consist of Product Overview, Related Products & User Outfit, Questions & Answers, and Ratings & Review.

heading: Atlier
description: Atlier is the back-end development for the Catwalk Project. This back-end is responsible for managing server calls between the client and the database, with millions of data entries to mimic real-user traffic.  Additional tools include API testing, ETL procedures, and Docker deployment.

heading: MVP Photo Editor
description: In a 2-day sprint, I've created a photo editor. The user is able to login or signup, and be able to edit photos that have either been imported or stored in the user's Google Firebase.
